original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantassa āpattiyaḥ channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe….
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhanti na vācataḥ pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa āpatti channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontassa āpatti channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ
